name: Business Contact Manager Customization
summary: Learn about .BCMX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: BCMX data can be imported using the Business Data Import and Export wizard included with MS Outlook.

description: Stores custom data from user-defined fields in an Outlook Business Contact Manager (.BCM) file; can only be imported by the database owner or an administrator of the computer where the database is stored.
